rules.description: Change return to left_control if pressed with other keys, to return if pressed alone
Change caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
DK61E: FN ALT CMD (SPC) CMD ALT FN
Sculpt: FN ALT CMD (SPC) CMD ALT FN
Keychorn C1: FN ALT CMD (SPC) CMD ALT FN
Keychorn C1: FN ALT CMD (SPC) CMD ALT FN
